text: The Only Game in Town is a 1970 American drama movie directed by George Stevens in his last movie before his death in 1975 and stars Elizabeth Taylor and Warren Beatty. The screenplay is based on the play of the same name by Frank D. Gilroy was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George Stevens Category:1970s English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1970 comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies
title: The Only Game in Town (movie)
